secondaries.shortDescription: Score 1 for each enemy unit in range of an objective marker at the start of that turn destroyed by a HERETIC ASTARTES, score 2 if you control 1+ objective that were controlled by your opponent at the start of the turn.

subObjectives.description: Killed 1 ennemy unit within range of an objective marker at the start of that turned with a HERETIC ASTARTES unit
Control 1+ objective that were controlled by your opponent at the start of that turn with a HERETIC ASTARTES fully within the range of the objective
